page.title: 18*AT SCHOOL IN OUR VILLAGE*
page.content: {I live at Haswell Plough. I am eleven {years old. When I arrive at school I go to see if my teacher has arrived. If she hasn't I wait outside for her. When she does arrive she asks me to do various little jobs. When it gets to 9 A.M the rest of the school comes in. If it is a Tuesday which is my favourite day we have an assembly first. Then we come back and sit in our groups and do language work until play. After play we have Maths through until dinner. After dinner I go through to the Nursery and get some recorder music as I have my own recorder. Then at 1 P.M the girls have needlework and the boys have craft. That takes us up to play. After that we have singing then P.E. By that time it is hometime for most pupils but we have activity night.
